targets.rawSql: select SUBSTRING(plugin_output,20,8) from opmon4.service_status where host_name="$hostname" and service_description="$service";
select SUBSTRING(plugin_output,50,29) from opmon4.service_status where host_name="$hostname" and service_description="$service";

list.definition: select host_name from opcfg.nagios_hosts where host_name like '%BIG-IP%';
list.label: DEVICE
list.name: hostname
list.query: select host_name from opcfg.nagios_hosts where host_name like '%BIG-IP%';

title: BIG-IP F5
description: A complete dashboard for viewing the monitoring of the BIG-IP solution (F5 networks), with cluster support
